alert.note: Alert for City of Hampton; City of Poquoson; City of Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 09 at 8:39PM EST until January 09 at 9:30PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EST FOR ISLE OF WIGHT...AND SOUTHEASTERN YORK COUNTIES...THE SOUTHWESTERN CITY OF POQUOSON...THE CENTRAL CITY OF SUFFOLK...THE CITY OF HAMPTON AND THE CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS... At 838 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fort Eustis to near Isle Of Wight to near Holland, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Newport News, Smithfield, Windsor, Suffolk, Fort Eustis, Rescue, Kings Fork, and Denbigh around 845 PM EST. Hampton, Christopher Newport University, Patrick Henry Field, Tabb, Beaconsdale, and Crittenden around 850 PM EST. Seaford and Northampton around 855 PM EST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Rushmere, Pons, Carrollton, Longview, Benns Church, Oriana, Bethel Church, Hilton Village, Chuckatuck, and Lees Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for northeastern North Carolina...and southeastern Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Hampton; City of Poquoson; City of Suffolk
